channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Broadcom’s stock is dropping — but here’s the big thing investors are missing
item.description: Broadcom’s overall guidance may not have wowed Wall Street after the stock’s big recent run, but “AI is strong and getting stronger,” one analyst note...

item.title: ‘I was pushed out of her life when she was 18’: My estranged daughter, 29, misuses drugs. Should I leave her my Roth IRA?
item.description: “I hardly have any communication with her.”

item.title: Voice AI that actually converts: New TTS model boosts sales 15% for major brands
item.description: A new spoken language model can quickly generate “infinite” new voices of varying genders, ages, demographics, based on a simple text prompt.

item.title: The Download: China’s AI agent boom, and GPS alternatives

item.title: My new husband gave me a contract and told me to ‘sign here’ — but I refused. It was the best decision of my life.
item.description: “My husband said there was no need to read the contract, and to just sign below his signature.”

item.title: My father-in-law has dementia and is moving in with us. Can we invoice him for a caregiver?
item.description: “Do we have an obligation to provide my wife’s troubled sibling with an accounting of my father-in-law’s expenses?”

item.title: Inside the race to find GPS alternatives
item.description: Later this month, an inconspicuous 150-kilogram satellite is set to launch into space aboard the SpaceX Transporter 14 mission. Once in orbit, it will...

item.title: These stocks of SpaceX rivals are getting a boost as Musk clashes with Trump
item.description: Shares of Rocket Lab and Intuitive Machines are getting a lift Friday as the outlook for Elon Musk’s SpaceX comes into question.

item.title: How much information do LLMs really memorize? Now we know, thanks to Meta, Google, Nvidia and Cornell
item.description: Using a clever solution, researchers find GPT-style models have a fixed memorization capacity of approximately 3.6 bits per parameter.

item.title: Google claims Gemini 2.5 Pro preview beats DeepSeek R1 and Grok 3 Beta in coding performance
item.description: Google said the newest version of Gemini 2.5 Pro, now on preview, gives faster and more creative responses while performing better than OpenAI's o3.
